parameters.query: =INSERT INTO "automation_rules" ("account_id", "name", "description", "event_name", "conditions", "actions", "created_at", "updated_at", "active") VALUES ({{$json.account}}, 'Start WPPConnect', 'Start Quepasa', 'message_created', '[{"values": ["/qrcode"], "attribute_key": "content", "filter_operator": "contains", "custom_attribute_type": ""}]', '[{"action_name": "send_webhook_event", "action_params": ["http://localhost:5678/webhook/WPPConnect"]}, {"action_name": "send_webhook_event", "action_params": ["http://localhost:5678/webhook-test/WPPConnect"]}]', NOW(), NOW(), true);
